attributes.action: Reconsider the position on not holding a referendum on EU Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent news reports inform the public that the Prime Minister does not intend to hold a referendum on supporting an EU Constitution.

The UK public should be consulted in such issues that may grossly affect their freedoms, rights and duties where a party other than the duly elected UK government dictates such policies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
